patthana16.60:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.60:1.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana16.60:1.1_2: anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.60:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
